description: We are inventing the AI travel experience of the future. Join the waitlist!
title: CoInvent AI
introduction: AiRial is an AI-powered travel planning assistant that can convert your imagination or favorite travel videos into fully planned and ready-to-book trips instantly. It offers a luxurious and stress-free travel booking experience by searching through hundreds of options and reviews for you.
features: Online travel booking with AI superpowers
Converts travel videos or social media content into trips
Personalized travel plans including flights, accommodation, and day plans
Multimodal input for creating plans from various sources
Curated recommendations based on expert advice
Saves time by searching across all relevant options simultaneously
targetPeople: Travel enthusiasts looking for a hassle-free and personalized travel planning experience

faqs.question: What is AiRial?
faqs.answer: AiRial is an AI-powered travel planning assistant that can convert your imagination or favorite travel videos into fully planned and ready-to-book trips instantly.

faqs.question: How does AiRial work?
faqs.answer: Simply describe your trip idea or provide a travel video, and AiRial will generate the entire trip for you, including flights, accommodation, and day plans.

faqs.question: Can AiRial personalize my travel plans?
faqs.answer: Yes, AiRial personalizes your travel plans based on your needs, including food, activities, and other preferences.

faqs.question: What sources can I use to create travel plans with AiRial?
faqs.answer: You can use travel videos, TikToks, blogs, tweets, or simply describe your trip idea to create travel plans with AiRial.

faqs.question: Does AiRial provide expert recommendations?
faqs.answer: Yes, AiRial curates recommendations based on expert advice from travel articles and reviews.
